results.definition: a label written or printed on paper, cardboard, or plastic that is attached to something to indicate its owner, nature, price, etc.
go after with the intent to catch
a small piece of cloth or paper
attach a tag or label to
a game in which one child chases the others; the one who is caught becomes the next chaser
a label associated with something for the purpose of identification
examples: semantic tags were attached in order to identify different meanings of the word

results.definition: provide with a name or nickname
(sports) the act of touching a player in a game (which changes their status in the game)
supply (blank verse or prose) with rhymes
touch a player while he is holding the ball
